content: AG 600-20D Angle grinder Powerful 14-amp angle grinder with dead man’s switch for cutting and grinding in metal, concrete, and masonry with discs up to 6” ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded safety features – new 3D Active Torque Control (ATC) for better protection against angle grinder kickback in any direction Hilti Smart Power technology – automatically adjusts power output to suit the material being cut, helping to deliver consistent performance and protecting the motor from overload Dead man’s switch – integrated dead man’s switch in tool handle for increased comfort and safety Rugged dust removal hood (optional) for virtually dustless operation and soft grips for greater working comfort Quick-acting brake stops the disc within a few seconds – ideal when working in cramped conditions Applications Cutting steel, concrete, and masonry Rough grinding and fine finishing metal, concrete, and masonry Removing coatings on cement and screed Renovating joints ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 6 in No load RPM: gear 1: 9400 rpm Trigger type: Paddle with deadman Technical Data | Disc diameter | 6 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 9400 rpm | Trigger type | Paddle with deadman | Disclaimer | Use angle grinder with double-sided guard ### ITEMS- 3898407 - AG 600-20D + Kwik Lock - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 600-20D 120V Angle grinder - 1x Wrench - 1x 5/8 D45 Flange inside - 1x Flange 5/8 D45 outside - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x Protective grinding cover 150 assy - 1x Clip-on front cover 150 - 1x Kwik lock 5/8 - 11
tag_description: Powerful 14-amp angle grinder with dead man’s switch for cutting and grinding in metal, concrete, and masonry with discs up to 6”
